attributes.title: I- ...... no.
attributes.review: This is the worst app available. It makes me wanna. Commit it.  The fact this even exists is just hurting my mental health.

attributes.title: Scared.
attributes.review: I opened this app and they immediately asked for my phone number!! The pedophilic Cheeto man is trying to raid my phone 😭🤢🤮

attributes.title: Gen Z doesn’t go out without a fight
attributes.review: I hate this app and should be taken off

attributes.title: the worst
attributes.review: it destroyed my phone and took up so much space i could no longer take pictures or download anything anymore. and this really scared orange dude with corn husk hair kept poppin up on my phone. i think it has a virus. don’t download.

attributes.title: this app works worse than my toaster
attributes.review: i clicked on it and all of a sudden wig man was trying to kidnap us i got like 50 notifications a min and my elephant went into a state of depressionall the birds that were flying around my house fell and all the squirrels died

attributes.title: what even is this 🍊
attributes.review: i opened the app and it showed me something i did not want to see at all. definetly need improvement, or maybe it just shouldn’t exist 🧚🏼✨🌸💐💝💘💕🤍🤓🤡👄🧚🏼! i will never again look at this trash app. thank you 😌.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: A Cheeto pops up on the screen all the time and it’s very disturbing to me and younger children 🤧. I do not recommend to anyone I MEAN ANYONE

attributes.title: bunkerboy
attributes.review: this app is the epitome of RACISM, SEXISM, & HOMOPHOBIA to say the least... open it to see nothing but updates on the abusive rapist that is in charge of our country! 😍😍

attributes.title: My poor dino nuggy😭
attributes.review: When i opened the app, i saw donald’s nudes😳 his poor wife😭 THEN I WENT TO GET MY PET DINOSAUR NUGGET AND IT WAS GONE OUT MY FRIDGE😭😭and then i went to bed and cried. when i woke up my fridge was gone💀i miss my dino nuggy 😭😭

attributes.title: terrible 👁💧👄💧👁
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to see what was going on and as soon as i opened it i saw the most terrifying orange figure ever that it made jump out of a window. i’m scarred for life and i will have to live with this trauma for the rest of my days. such a tragedy. 👁👄👁
